channel.title: Charity on Live Life D̶a̶n̶g̶e̶r̶o̶u̶s̶Curiously
channel.description: Recent content in Charity on Live Life D̶a̶n̶g̶e̶r̶o̶u̶s̶Curiously

item.title: Pie a Professor
item.description: Today, I saw a strange event in my school. Staffs in iSchool Syracuse University were raising money to be donated for United Way. What they did was providing a booth were people can throw pie to iSchool’s professors face. The price is $5 for student and $10 for faculty, but if you only have $3, they’ll take it anyway. I was also offered to throw pie on professor face, but I refused it is not because I didn’t have money, but I think that is not appropriate.
